
```{r}
R=runif(nrow(mat1))

Rv=matrix(0,nrow=nrow(mat1),ncol=100)

Rv[,1]=R

for(i in 2:100){
  Rvnew= mat1 %*% Rv[,i-1]
  Rv[,i] = Rvnew/norm(Rvnew, "F") 
  
  message(i," ", dist(rbind(Rv[,i],Rv[,i-1])))
}
```
